La secuela de los mejores juegos de Valve pero multiplicado x100 Gran historia, personajes y lo mas importante: El concepto nadie creeria un juego de puzzle en primera persona y menos con portales, el juego te hace completar salas con puzzle a lo largo de 9 capitulos (Guau!), el juego no tiene dificultad (enserio NO tiene dificultad) este juego no es para los que les gusta pensar pero si apenas tienes un minimo interes comprale y veras

Το παιχνίδι είναι ένα έπος. Είναι κάτι περισσότερο απο ένα παιχνίδι με Puzzles. Τα γραφικά, οι ήχοι, τα μηνύματα που ακούγονται κατα την διάρκεια του παιχνιδιού, σε κάνουν να ταυτιστείς με αυτό.

Τα γραφικά είναι πολύ καλά και παίζει σε συστήματα με χαμηλά specs πολύ χαλαρα. Σε λάπτοπ με i3 330M, Radeon HD 5470 έπεξε στα High σε καλα FPS.

Πιστεύω ότι το 50% του ωραίου του παιχνιδιού αυτού είναι οι συνομιλίες που συμβαίνουν όσο παίζεις. Όποιος το έπεξε με κλειστό ήχο, έχασε.

Θεωρώ ότι είναι Must Play για όλους.

Fazer um segundo jogo melhor que o primeiro sempre é um desafio para as desenvolvedoras, exceto para Valve.Uma ótima continuação, bem mais imersiva e com enredo, maiores vinculos com o universo Half Life e tudo aquilo que já era bom no Portal 1. Jogo essencial e obrigatório para amantes do estilo.

PROS:
-Jogabilidade
-Imersão
-Enredo/história

CONTRAS:
-??

Portal 2 is amazing, having never played the first one I can tell you I was only a little lost in the story, at first, but throughout the game you learn everything leading up to Portal 2's story. I was kinda blown away by the whole concept of this game and it made me feel smarter just to be playing and completing the puzzles. The atmosphere is great and the characters are amazingly entertaining and voiced by some A list hollywood actors, oh and the song at the end credits is amazing and hilarious. I highly recommend this game, one of my favorites. *9/10
Puzzles

A really good sequel. Gameplay is sufficiently updated with new mechanics and the puzzles are well-designed. The story narrative continues in a good way with great voice-acting, and the new co-op puzzles with strangers in online matchmaking are a great new feature your first time through.

首先本作传送门2是我非常喜欢的游戏之一 因为我觉得这个游戏十分的有趣 在某一个地方打开一个光圈然后在另一个地方打开一个光圈 实现一种空间的移动 听起来很有意思

这是系列的第二部作品 即Portal 的续作 首先得提到官方肯定听到了玩家们关于Portal的反馈 : 整个游戏流程太短了！ 于是Portal 2 的游戏流程就变长了 但是个人感觉比较生硬 被强行拖长的感觉 这点个人觉得是一点点瑕疵 游戏整体很不错 保留了Portal的玩法 并且新加入了多人模式 合作破解关卡谜题 这些都很棒  画面方面我想不出怎么评价 跟半条命2没什么差别 说差有点牵强 但是画面党人看着画面好想也不满足 姑且算中上吧 操作性方面 ... 这并不是一个考操作的游戏 所以我觉得可以绕过 音效方面挺不错 故事剧情还算有意思 不过就如之前提到个有点被生硬拖长的感觉 游戏性很好 你只要能接受这种玩法 应该就可以很愉快的继续玩下去

另外本作有创意工坊的支持 也就是说玩家可以自己做些地图上传到创意工坊给其他玩家或者下载其他玩家的地图来体验 也算一直给游戏补充新鲜血液吧

Portal 2 is a not just a game, it's a advanced puzzle-solving game where you have only a portal gun. The portals are useful for solving the puzzles. Cubes to Wheatley and other cores. The player has to think through the story with pieces of evidence by Wheatley and GLaDoS. As Chell advances through the test chambers, more chapters of the story of Portal starts. And then it's Chapter 9 and the last chapters where Wheatley attempts to kill you. But Chell uses her portal gun to defeat the evil core and end the game. It also has a level editor, which players can make their own test chambers and post them to the world, where the world tries attempting the user-created test chambers. Portal starts with Valve thinking the ancient Hoopity the Hoop would be a meme, but the cake was a meme which grabbed the Portal series attention. You play from the 2x fast version of Still Alive (the radio song at the start of Portal 1) and you trapped in a glass box with a timer that will run out and place a portal on the wall to destroying Wheatley. I really recommend this game just because of the level editor and a core appearing throughout the chambers (Wheatley is a object so you have a chance to grab him. I just use noclip to grab him). So DO play this game.

Sem dúvidas o melhor Puzzle que já joguei! Valve mandou bem! A campanha é muito boa, e jogar com um amigo deixa tudo mais Divertido! Se estiver na promoção, não pense 2 vezes!

Nota 100/10
Mejor juego en Steam.

This game is a watered down and padded version of the first. It offers nothing new, just more of the same and with a "forced" feeling throughout. The first game was a lightning bolt from a clear sky, new, fresh, and with good humour. This game on the other hand feels like an unnecessary sequel, it offers more of the same, but it is no longer fresh, there's nothing innovative here, and the humour has taken several steps down, this is noticeable right from the start. 

Akin to an athlete that is past his prime, it is not really a bad game, but compared to the first it falls flat, my dissapointment makes me unable to recommend it, better if it would not have existed (think the Matrix-sequels).
One of the most fun co-op games that's ever made. If you like puzzling and some intertia physics, this is definitely a game to play.
Great continuation of the first, but why in the world didn't Chell escape after the first one?

В общем... Portal 2 - самая лучшая однопользовательская игра от VALVe за последнее время. И последняя игра, сделанная ими с душой...

Что в ней особенного? 

Отличнейший сюжет и настоящий чёрный юмор!
Крутые головоломки и неподражаемые персонажи! 
Портальная пушка и чёртова лаборатория по исследованию природы порталов!
Пасхалки!
Про сюжет уже говорили?
Озвучка, как английская, так и русская (от последней вообще не ожидал ничего, а тут на тебе)
После 115+ часов игры можно смело сказать, что Portal 2 заслуженно получил множество игровых наград. 
Ах да... Это как раз тот самый случай, когда терпеть не можешь антагониста, но влюбляешься в него и не хочешь отпускать...

11 тортов из 10
